3646.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And (the) Day|114|127|819$يَحْشُرُهُمْ|He will gather them|148|174|6028$جَمِيعًا|all,|78|104|300$ثُمَّ|then|50|76|293$يَقُولُ|He will say|90|116|77$لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ|to the Angels,|114|127|311$أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمْ|`Were these you|144|227|14301$كَانُواْ|they were|87|253|94$يَعْبُدُونَ|worshipping?`|112|195|8757$

3647.verse: قَالُواْ|They will say,|111|121|101$سُبْحَـٰنَكَ|`Glory be to You!|136|157|336$أَنتَ|You|58|79|341$وَلِيُّنَا|(are) our Protector,|151|172|6896$مِن دُونِهِمۖ|not them.|116|137|7345$بَلْ|Nay,|50|60|848$كَانُواْ|they used|86|96|94$يَعْبُدُونَ|(to) worship|101|120|8757$ٱلْجِنَّۖ|the jinn,|75|94|5898$أَكْثَرُهُم|most of them|108|127|937$بِهِم|in them|69|88|125$مُّؤْمِنُونَ|(were) believers.`|140|150|5199$

3648.verse: فَٱلْيَوْمَ|But today|85|97|6437$لَا|not|42|66|30$يَمْلِكُ|possess power|117|140|4831$بَعْضُكُمْ|some of you|101|124|384$لِبَعْضٍ|on others|83|106|385$نَّفْعًا|to benefit|85|108|3761$وَلَا|and not|71|83|25$ضَرًّا|to harm,|76|89|5166$وَنَقُولُ|and We will say|123|149|3557$لِلَّذِينَ|to those|76|102|750$ظَلَمُواْ|who wronged,|113|139|558$ذُوقُواْ|`Taste|75|101|3558$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|147|1786$ٱلنَّارِ|(of) the Fire|101|136|410$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|132|232$كُنتُم|you used|80|150|214$بِهَا|to [it]|60|130|1203$تُكَذِّبُونَ|deny.`|91|126|13899$

3650.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|82|46$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم|We (had) given them|160|181|1841$مِّن|any|50|71|53$كُتُبٍ|Scriptures|87|108|14303$يَدْرُسُونَهَاۖ|which they could study,|180|201|14304$وَمَآ|and not|71|82|46$أَرْسَلْنَآ|We sent|82|121|1342$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them|72|150|3030$قَبْلَكَ|before you|91|168|10484$مِن|any|50|128|53$نَّذِيرٍ|warner.|70|109|4841$

3651.verse: وَكَذَّبَ|And denied|93|102|5691$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|107|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ|(were) before them|149|167|1094$وَمَا|and not|71|89|46$بَلَغُواْ|they have attained|147|165|3694$مِعْشَارَ|a tenth|86|95|14305$مَآ|(of) what|83|92|262$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ|We (had) given them.|165|184|1841$فَكَذَّبُواْ|But they denied|125|144|14306$رُسُلِىۖ|My Messengers,|126|145|14307$فَكَيْفَ|so how|75|94|2727$كَانَ|was|57|66|913$نَكِيرِ|My rejection?|109|109|12128$

3646.verse: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"

3647.verse: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."

3648.verse: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."

3649.verse: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."

3650.verse: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.

3651.verse: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.

3652.verse: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah, [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.

3653.verse: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."

3654.verse: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."
